explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for the Marker and its title/snippet, and avoided creating or adding views when required data is missing to prevent empty layouts or NPEs.
resolve_compilation_errors: Replaced getApplicationContext() usage with the existing mContext from the enclosing onMapReady scope and used fully qualified class names to avoid import issues.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Center-aligned the snippet TextView using Gravity.CENTER and conditionally added the snippet view only when the marker snippet is non-null and non-empty, while preserving the vertical layout and title styling.
refactoring: Marked local variables as final for clarity and immutability and kept the method structure aligned with the existing adapter pattern.
misc: Minor ordering and formatting adjustments to match the surrounding project style; no new custom API calls were introduced.
